TopicTitle: Make asteroids on an already saved file.

Articles.Content: Hey guys. I've heard somewhere before that when you download v. 0.23.5, the asteroids won't spawn on your already saved files. I was wondering if this was true and if there is a way to make your save files spawn them by editing the .cfg file?

Hey guys. I've heard somewhere before that when you download v. 0.23.5, the asteroids won't spawn on your already saved files. I was wondering if this was true and if there is a way to make your save files spawn them by editing the .cfg file?

It's probably just a matter of adding the relevant SCENARIO entry into your save. Mine looks like this:

	SCENARIO
	{
		name = ScenarioDiscoverableObjects
		scene = 7, 8, 5
		| = 56328601
		sizeCurve
		{
			key = 0 0 1.5 1.5
			key = 0.3 0.45 0.875 0.875
			key = 0.7 0.55 0.875 0.875
			key = 1 1 1.5 1.5
		}
	}
